'''Moonchase Charms''' are Adventure Items that can be found during the [[Moonlight Merriment]] [[Event]].

When a Moonchase Charm is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on the [[Minimap]] along with a sound effect, similar to an [[Oculus]]. Some of them may be found in [[Mystmoon Chest]]s. All of the locations can be found in the [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=271 Teyvat Interactive Map].

They appear on map as [[File:Icon Moonchase Charms.svg|25x25px|link=]]. [[Linyang]] can also be asked to mark uncollected Moonchase Charms.

Each Mystmoon Charm collected will provide a different percentage exploration for each [[Moonlight Seeker]] stage.
* 30 in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Stalwart Stone|Path of Stalwart Stone]] (Liyue): 2% each
* 20 in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Gentle Breezes|Path of Gentle Breezes]] (Mondstadt): ~2.86% each
* 20 in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Austere Frost|Path of Austere Frost]] (Dragonspine): ~2.86% each
